summary: This memo details the establishment of official cover backstopping for Calvin W. Hicks, utilizing the U.S. Army Staff Group. It outlines procedures for notification when the cover is no longer needed, coordination for changes in Hicks' status, and handling of his Unit ID card.
title: Establishment of Official Cover Backstop for Calvin W. HICKS
sender: Joseph M. Adams, Chief, Official Cover & Liaison, CCD Branch, CCG
